EmailTemplate.subject: Learn about: Data Federation with Apache HAWQ Using the PXF Extension Framework
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thursday, December 17, 2015 JOIN HERE <https://pivotalcommunity.adobeconnect.com/hawqnest/> Join us here <[[https://pivotalcommunity.adobeconnect.com/hawqnest/]]> for our next Apache HAWQ (incubating) community this December 17th. No registration is necessary. To receive reminders of this event, please subscribe to the Apache HAWQ user email list <[[mailto:user-subscribe@hawq.incubator.apache.org]]>.
Apache HAWQ has amazing data federation capabilities. With Apache HAWQ, you can not only read-write or execute SQL queries and advanced analytics natively against Apache Parquet data stores, you can read-write, query, or analyze Avro, Hive tables, JSON and more. Accomplish this seamlessly with Apache HAWQ. Long term, data federation will be extended to ORC.
In this talk, Goden Yao provides a basic architecture overview of Apache HAWQ and adds a deep dive discussion on PXF specifically, including typical use cases and advantages. PXF is a great area to start if you want to contribute to the Apache HAWQ code base.
Join us here <[[https://pivotalcommunity.adobeconnect.com/hawqnest/]]> for this virtual meeting of the Apache HAWQ community. {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
12/17 San Francisco, CA 4:00 PM PST UTC-8 hours 12/17 New York, NY 7:00 PM EST UTC-5 hours 12/18 Beijing, China 8:00 AM CST UTC+8 hours
To receive reminders of this event, please subscribe to the Apache HAWQ user email list <[[mailto:user-subscribe@hawq.incubator.apache.org]]>.
About the speaker: Ting (Goden) Yao is a Senior Product Manager at Pivotal.
We look forward to having you join us.
